txt.en:
You have recovered a note that reads as follows:

'In the western reaches, there is said to be a small dwarf-home located in the mountains. It is believed that several duvodiad have gained entrance and are encamped there. We must enter this lair and kill everyone within. The consequences will be severe if you fail. 

'Use care as you approach the cave, for very powerful draig-math -- gwiber and others -- dwell in that vale, do not send scouts as lone scouts would likely become draig-fodder.'

Perhaps you should traverse the pass and speak with these hold refugees and warn them of the coming attack.'

<rgb=#FF0000>This quest opens up a number of fellowship quests and is not intended for solo play.</rgb>

'You are quite bold to enter this hall unannounced. However, thank you for bringing this note to our attention.  We shall prepare the hall for unwelcome visitors. \n\n'Be wary as you journey in Thr贸r's Coomb, for there are quite a few dangerous creatures in these lands.'
This letter reveals that a group of the Draig-l没th are in the process of making plans to send men to kill anyone hiding in an old dwarf home.
Travel to the dwarf-hall in Thr贸r's Coomb

The dwarf-hall can be found high within a mountain pass, north of the river on the north-west face of Thr贸r's Coomb.\n\nAs the note reveals a threat upon those that make their home in the heights of the mountains, you may wish to warn them.
